contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law No. 1385-2017 to designate 263 Adelaide Street West (Purman Building) (Trinity-Spadina, Ward 20) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: TE26.12 - Alterations to a Designated Property, Intention to Designate under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act and Authority to Enter into a Heritage Easement Agreement - 263 Adelaide Street West
By-law 1385-2017 - To designate the property at 263 Adelaide Street West (Purman Building) as being of cultural heritage value or interest

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act  R.S.O. 1990, Chapter 0.18 and  City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
title: Notice of Passing of By-law 1385-2017 - 263 Adelaide Street West (Purman Building)
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
